articles.description: Circle, the issuer of USDC, will launch a new stablecoin pegged to the euro, the company announced Thursday.
articles.title: USDC Issuer Circle Announces Euro-Backed Stablecoin ￼ Euro Coin Will be Available to Mint and Redeem on June 30

articles.author: Jason Levin
articles.description:
Competition to become the go-to crypto native messaging platform is intensifying with data analytics platform Nansen joining the race. Nansen launched a crypto-native messaging platform currently open in beta to their paid users as well as token-holders of select communities, the company said in an emailed statement.   The platform, Nansen Connect, was built as a …
  Nansen Bets Web3 Messaging Will Deter Hacks and Spam Read More »
articles.title: Nansen Bets Web3 Messaging Will Deter Hacks and Spam
